string-array.name: products_description
string-array.item:
- Optimal weight distribution for a controlled swing
 - Oval shaped strike face makes toe-nailing easy
 - Side nail puller for efficient nail pulling
 - Magnetic nail starter for easy 1-handed nail placement
 - Rip claw
 - 22 oz.
 - Framing hammer

- Box end needs just 3.6-degree swing to turn a fastener\n - Open end also ratchets to quickly remove fasteners where box ends cannot reach\n - Alloy steel construction provides durability and long-lasting performance

- Double-speed open/close adjustment allows you to work more efficiently
 - Laser etched scale for quick and easy size adjustment
 - Shark fin design, heavy duty, carbon steel
 - Chrome-plated, half polish, no grip

- Internal bit storage holds up to 12 bits
 - Heavy-duty ratchet mechanism for high torque applications
 - Removable bar can also be used in power drills
 - Handle will also take regular bit for use in confined space

- Supplies significantly more cutting and gripping power over standard pliers
 - Outfitted with bi-material handles for strong grip and comfort
 - Fashioned with an aggressive crosshatch tooth design for enhanced gripping
 - Constructed with chrome vanadium steel for strength and durability

- 4.75, x 9 steel blade
 - 54 long with wooden handle
 - Digs 5.5 holes
 - Hardwood Handle
 - lightweight and easy to use

- Heavy duty tempered steel blade
 - Extra-wide foot steps for more power and security
 - Sturdy comfortable handle with D-grip made of engineered materials
 - Industrial grade tool for landscaping and construction professionals

- Heavy duty tempered steel blade
 - Extra-wide foot steps for more power and security
 - Sturdy comfortable handle with D-grip made of engineered materials
 - Industrial grade tool for landscaping and construction professionals
- Keeps paint off of carpet wall, ceilings, trim and windows\n - 2 inch wide guard\n - Secure, riveted handle

- Handcrafted
 - Easy clean up
 - Interior and Exterior
 - For all paints and stains
 - Reusable

- Heavy duty moisture and solvent resistant core
 - Recommend for use with flat, eggshell and satin paints
 - Shed-free, knit fabric
 - Excellent durability and easy to clean for re-use

The hammer drill provides a 360° locking auxiliary handle to allow for control and comfort in difficult drilling operations. The handle has a built-in depth gauge for drilling accuracy. The 1191VSRK has a variable-speed reversing trigger, which helps with accurate bit starting, as well as removing fasteners or bound bits.

- Three-mode LED provides lighting in dark work environments up to 20X brighter than previous model
 - LED spotlight mode features 20-minute shutoff function allowing for extended work time in dark or confined spaces
 - Ergonomic comfort grip handle provides ideal balance and tool control
 - DEWALT brushless motor delivers up to 57% more run time over brushed
- Softgrip® handles for comfort and control\n - Non-stick blade coating reduces friction to make cutting easier

- Best in class cordless runtime delivers up to 339 cuts per charge in 2-inch x 4-inch SPF lumber\n - Depth of cut - best in class at 2-9/16-inch\n - Electronic brake - stops the blade after the trigger is released
- Paint Nozzle: 1.7mm - Capacity-Volume: 32 Fl. Oz - Working air pressure: 50-70 PSI - 1/4inch NPT Air Inlet - Avg CFM: 6 CFM
